original: MAP BY FRENCHY
zh_trans: 地图作者 FRENCHY

original: [STAGE 1 HOSPITAL OF BLACKWATER]
zh_trans: [第一章：黑水镇医院]

original: Blackwater main gates will open in 60 sec
zh_trans: 黑水镇的正门将在 60 秒后开启

original: Blackwater main gates will open in 5 sec
zh_trans: 黑水镇的正门将在 5 秒后开启

original: Blackwater hospital doors will open in 20 sec
zh_trans: 黑水镇医院的门将在 20 秒后打开

original: Find the key to the maternity ward
zh_trans: 找到产科病房的钥匙

original: We have collected a bottle of pill, it can increase the number of times the heal can be used.
zh_trans: 我们已经收集到了一瓶药丸，它可以增加治疗的使用次数。

original: We have collected a battery, it can increase the number of times the lantern can be used.
zh_trans: 我们已经收集到了一节电池，它可以增加提灯可使用的次数。

original: Door to maternity ward will open in 40 sec
zh_trans: 产科病房的门将在 40 秒后打开

original: Nice, key was found, now we can enter maternity ward room.
zh_trans: 太好了，钥匙找到了，现在我们可以进入产科病房了。

original: Door to maternity ward will open in 5 sec
zh_trans: 产科病房的门将在 5 秒后打开

original: The door will close in 5 sec
zh_trans: 这扇门将在 5 秒后关闭

original: Who owns this casket?
zh_trans: 这个棺材是谁的？

original: The door will open in 25 sec
zh_trans: 门将在 25 秒后打开

original: Omg did you hear that? Someone broke in
zh_trans: 哦，天哪，你听到了吗？有人闯进来了。

original: Find the key from storage room
zh_trans: 从储物间找到钥匙。

original: Door to the storage room will open in 25 sec
zh_trans: 通往储物间的门将在 25 秒后打开

original: Find crowbar to break down the wc door
zh_trans: 寻找撬棍砸开厕所的门。

original: The door will close in 25 sec
zh_trans: 门将在 25 秒后关闭

original: Door to wc will open in 30 sec
zh_trans: 通往厕所的门将在 30 秒后打开

original: Pick up the key for the second floor room
zh_trans: 捡起二楼房间的钥匙。

original: The door will close in 20 sec
zh_trans: 门将在 20 秒后关闭

original: The door will open in 20 sec
zh_trans: 门将在 20 秒后打开

original: Pick up the key
zh_trans: 捡起钥匙。

original: Seems this wardrobe cant be moved, there might be secret passage
zh_trans: 看起来这个衣柜无法移动，可能有秘密通道。

original: The door will close in 30 sec
zh_trans: 门将在 30 秒后关闭

original: Good, we found lever that will move wardrobe
zh_trans: 太好了，我们找到了能移动衣柜的控制杆。

original: Who is this? Looks like a little girl
zh_trans: 这是谁？看起来像个小女孩。

original: Oh god she is scary, run for your lifes
zh_trans: 我的天，太可怕了，快跑！

original: Good, we escaped from her, now we need to find a key from secret lab
zh_trans: 好，我们从她手中逃脱了，现在需要从秘密实验室找到一把钥匙。

original: Blackwater - this crazy ass bitch not letting us through, we need to get rid of her so we can get to the lab
zh_trans: 黑水 - 这个疯婆子不让我们通过，我们得除掉她才能进入实验室。

original: Girl is dead now we can pass through
zh_trans: 她死了，现在我们可以通过了。

original: AFK TELEPORT IN 10 SECOND
zh_trans: 挂机玩家将在 10 秒后传送

original: Doors to Blackwater underground lab will open in 30 sec
zh_trans: 通往黑水镇地下实验室的门将在 30 秒后打开

original: AFK TELEPORT IN 5 SECOND
zh_trans: 挂机玩家将在 5 秒后传送

original: The doors will close in 20 sec
zh_trans: 门将在 20 秒后关闭

original: Stage 1 - Completed
zh_trans: 第一章 - 完成

original: [STAGE 2 LABORATORY OF BLACKWATER]
zh_trans: [第二章 黑水实验室]

original: Finally we got into the lab, now we need to power it up
zh_trans: 我们终于抵达了实验室，现在我们需要给它供电

original: Lever is in guard post, find the key
zh_trans: 拉杆在岗亭里，去找钥匙

original: Door to guard post will open in 30 sec
zh_trans: 岗亭的门30秒后开启

original: Door to guard post will open in 5 sec
zh_trans: 岗亭的门5秒后开启

original: Activate lever to power up the lab
zh_trans: 启动拉杆来为实验室供电

original: The door will open in 10 sec
zh_trans: 门将在10秒后开启

original: To open 2-nd door we need 6 keycards
zh_trans: 我们需要找齐六张钥匙卡来开启二号大门

original: Door to the main office will open in 10 sec
zh_trans: 去往主办公室的门10秒后打开

original: Door to the main office will open in 5 sec
zh_trans: 主办公室的门将在10秒后打开

original: This is main office, we need to find key to other rooms
zh_trans: 这里是主办公室，我们需要找到去往其它屋子的钥匙

original: Office doors will open in 20 sec
zh_trans: 办公室的门将在20秒后打开

original: AFK TELEPORT IN 10 SECODN
zh_trans: 10秒后传送挂机的僵尸

original: Office doors will close in 10 sec
zh_trans: 办公室的门将在10秒后打开

original: Now we need to find other 3 keycards in main lab
zh_trans: 现在我们需要在主实验室找到另外三张钥匙卡

original: Door to main lab will open in 20 sec
zh_trans: 主实验室的门20秒后打开

original: This is main lab, we need to find keys from experimental rooms
zh_trans: 这里是主实验室，我们需要找到实验室里的钥匙

original: The doors will open in 20 sec
zh_trans: 门将在20秒后开启

original: The doors will close in 15 sec
zh_trans: 门将在 15 秒后关闭

original: Door to 2-nd lab will open in 20 sec
zh_trans: 通往第二实验室的门将在 20 秒后打开

original: OK we found 6 keycards now we can enter to second part of the lab
zh_trans: 好，我们现在找到了6张钥匙卡，这样我们就可以进入实验室的第二部分了

original: Door to 2-nd lab will open in 25 sec
zh_trans: 通往第二实验室的门将在 25 秒后打开

original: We need to gather chemicals for the bomb that will clear the way
zh_trans: 我们需要收集用于制造炸弹的化学物品，以便清除障碍继续前进

original: Doors to left side of the lab will open in 5sec
zh_trans: 实验室左侧的门将在 5 秒后打开

original: Find the key for left side of experimental rooms
zh_trans: 找到实验室左侧的钥匙

original: The doors to will open in 10 sec
zh_trans: 门将在 10 秒后打开

original: We need to activate all levers to power up doors that jammed with stones
zh_trans: 我们需要激活所有控制杆，为被石头卡住的门提供动力使其恢复正常

original: Door to the right side of the lab will open in 15 sec
zh_trans: 通往实验室右侧的门将会在 15 秒后打开

original: Door into office will open in 15 sec
zh_trans: 进入办公室的门将在 15 秒后打开

original: Pull the lever
zh_trans: 拉动控制杆

original: The door will open in 15 sec
zh_trans: 这扇门将在 15 秒后打开

original: The door will close in 15 sec
zh_trans: 这扇门将会在 15 秒后关闭

original: NICE! we got power back, all is left are chemicals for the bomb
zh_trans: 太好了！我们恢复了电力，剩下的就只是制造炸弹所需的化学药品了

original: Door to storage room will open in 20 sec
zh_trans: 通往储藏室的门将在 20 秒后打开

original: We need crowbar to remove wooden blocks from wardrobe
zh_trans: 我们需要撬棍来移除衣柜上的木块

original: Pick up the key from locked office, you will find crowbar there
zh_trans: 从上锁的办公室拿起钥匙，你会在那里找到撬棍

original: Door into office will open in 20 sec
zh_trans: 进入办公室的门将会在 20 秒后打开

original: We finally got crowbar, now we can remove wooden blocks
zh_trans: 终于拿到撬棍了，现在我们可以移除那些木块了

original: NICE! we have 1 out of 3 chemicals
zh_trans: 太棒了！我们找到了1/3的化学药品。

original: Door to storage room will open in 30 sec
zh_trans: 通往储藏室的门将在 30 秒后打开

original: We found 2-nd chemical, last one is on the left side of the lab
zh_trans: 我们找到了第二种化学药品，最后一种在实验室的左侧

original: Frenchy is retarded, just pick up the meat
zh_trans: 弗兰奇真是个蠢货，赶紧把肉捡起来

original: Hunter will break the storage room door in 30 sec
zh_trans: 将在 30 秒后打开储藏室的门

original: Bomb is ready we are good to go
zh_trans: 炸药准备完毕，我们可以出发了

original: Omg! We need to kill that hunter
zh_trans: 天哪！我们得干掉那个猎人。

original: The door will open in 30 sec
zh_trans: 门将在 30 秒后打开

original: AFK TELEPORT IN 15 SECOND
zh_trans: 挂机玩家将在 15 秒后传送

original: The door to the sewer will open in 40 sec
zh_trans: 通往下水道的门将在 40 秒后打开

original: The door to the sewer will close in 10 sec
zh_trans: 通往下水道的门将在 10 秒后关闭
